greeting.title: Hi! My name is J칩nas Helgi
greeting.text: I specialize in web design and web development. I currently work as a software specialist at one the largest IT/tech companies in Iceland, Advania. I make sure that all my interfaces and all my websites look good no matter what device they are viewed on.

curriculum.title: The Icelandic national curriculum
curriculum.text: Design and develop the The Icelandic national curriculum to an electronic format along with ongoing development and maintenance.
